title: Topiramate and Stimulant Replacement Therapy for Cocaine Use Disorder
itunes:title: Topiramate and Stimulant Replacement Therapy for Cocaine Use Disorder
description:
This episode discusses the evidence and benefits of topiramate and stimulant replacement therapy for cocaine use disorder. It also addresses the use of these medications when there are comorbidities, such as alcohol use disorder and ADHD. 

Faculty: Andrew Saxon, M.D. 
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 1 CME: Experimental Pharmacotherapies for Stimulant Use Disorder
  • Topiramate and Methylphenidate for Cocaine Use Disorder and Its Comorbidities
